items.title: Security
items.description: Built with security-first principles. Verified boot chains, cryptographic signatures, and transparent security practices protect your devices from threats.
items.altText: Security features icon - Built with security-first principles

items.title: Developer-first
items.description: Modern tooling, comprehensive documentation, and intuitive APIs make firmware development productive and enjoyable for developers at every level.
items.altText: Developer-first icon - Modern tooling and comprehensive documentation

items.title: Transparency
items.description: Every component is open source and auditable. No black boxes, no hidden backdoors. You can verify exactly what's running on your hardware.
items.altText: Transparency icon - Open source and auditable components

items.title: Stability
items.description: Canopy sticks to a fixed release cycle and supports Long-Term Support (LTS) branches. We have defined backporting windows so that you can be sure the code base stays stable and secure.
items.altText: Six month release cycle icon - Fixed release schedule

items.title: Pre-build Binaries
items.description: Canopy provides pre-build binaries for a variety of supported hardware. Easy to get started - flash it and you're ready to go
items.altText: Pre-build binaries icon - Ready-to-flash firmware for supported hardware

items.title: Hardware CI
items.description: Canopy does more. We test every commit on real hardware, providing rock-solid stability.
items.altText: Hardware CI icon - Testing every commit on real hardware
